div.p: I have just read your letter of the 17 and am glad you have paid off all debts and are soon to be through the trouble of moving and by your letter I suppose you are in Bloomington today and that Alex has been able to assist you in the tark I wish I could have been with you but it could not be I did not write last sunday as I Expected you would learn I olrit prefer you could get the letter. take care of yourself and the children how is charlotte I am writing in the office &can not write now I am well
Kiss all your W R Hackley
